text.title: Get a Sponsor for Sound Offs

head.s: Get a Sponsor for Sound Offs

p.s: If you have an affinity for cars , marketing , and audio equipment , you might be interested in learning how to get a sponsor for sound offs .
Sound offs are competitions in which cars demonstrate their custom-built audio systems and compete for titles and prices .
Getting a sponsor for sound offs involves a lot of research , precision , and hard work , but can pay off by getting your car a state-of-the-art sound system and the sponsors a lot of exposure .
Read the following steps to find out how to get a sponsor for sound offs .

item.s: Design the sound system for your car .
Unless you already have some celebrity status in the automotive or audio industry , you should approach a respected car audio store to help you select the products and design the system .

figure.rend: Get a Sponsor for Sound Offs Step 1 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Research potential manufacturers of each part of the audio system .
Try to find at least 2 candidates for each part .
For each manufacturer , carefully list the model number of the product you need , as well as the contact details of the marketing director of each company .

figure.rend: Get a Sponsor for Sound Offs Step 2 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Create visual plans of the audio system .

Make them as clear as possible by drawing the layout of your car , and then creating additional layers ( if you 're using computer graphics ) or transparencies ( for paper ) for the hardware and wiring .

figure.rend: Get a Sponsor for Sound Offs Step 3 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Create a portfolio of your own work , including a resume , publications , awards , and other noteworthy details .
If you have a logo , include it .

figure.rend: Get a Sponsor for Sound Offs Step 4 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Write up a marketing plan that outlines how , when , and where the car 's sound system will get coverage .
Substantiate your plan with letters of interest from publishers , producers , and event managers .

figure.rend: Get a Sponsor for Sound Offs Step 5 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Draft a cover letter that outlines your motivation for undertaking this project , a description of the audio system , what you want from each manufacturer , and what type of coverage they 'll receive in return .
Ask for a reply to your request within a time period that works for you .
An acceptable time frame is 14 days .

figure.rend: Get a Sponsor for Sound Offs Step 6 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Assemble a package for each manufacturer that includes a cover letter , the visual plans for the audio system , your portfolio , and the marketing plan .

figure.rend: Get a Sponsor for Sound Offs Step 7 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Send a package to the marketing director of each company .
To ensure timely delivery , it 's recommended to use priority shipping .

figure.rend: Get a Sponsor for Sound Offs Step 8 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Follow up with each manufacturer after 2 weeks to find out whether they are willing to sponsor you .

figure.rend: Get a Sponsor for Sound Offs Step 9 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Negotiate the details of each sponsorship agreement to find a deal that works for both parties .

figure.rend: Get a Sponsor for Sound Offs Step 10 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Sign the sponsorship agreements .
If you 're unsure about the terms and conditions of the agreements , have a lawyer explain them to you before you sign anything .

figure.rend: Get a Sponsor for Sound Offs Step 11 Version 2.jpg

item.s: After getting a sponsor for sound offs , follow your contract and keep the sponsor informed of your project 's progress .
Use the names of your sponsors to get maximum exposure in the media .
